description.p: Mortals do frequent hell for various reasons - adventurers, crusaders, merchants, slavers, slaves and ...lawyers. You were born in Hell, your parents belonging to that very limited group that reside on the lower planes. Life is tough, but not impossible, for mortals here, but with the right knowledge and a little luck some survive long enough to make a go of it. Your time here has hardened you, and you are wise to the plane's dangers.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Any one of your choice
Equipment: A set of common clothes, a knife, your citizenship 'papers' (flayed skin scroll) , a random trinket (chapter 5 of the PHB), and a pouch containing 10gp.

description.p: Living your entire life in Hell, you have adapted in some ways. You have advantage to all saving throws to endure environmental conditions that impose exhaustion.
